remarks: Lemma for ~ colperp .  First part of lemma 8.20 of [Schwabhauser] p. 62.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Oct-2019.)
statement:
colperpex.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
colperpex.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
colperpex.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
colperpex.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
colperpex.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
colperpexlem.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
colperpexlem.m $e |- M = ( S ` A ) $.
colperpexlem.n $e |- N = ( S ` B ) $.
colperpexlem.k $e |- K = ( S ` Q ) $.
colperpexlem.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
colperpexlem.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
colperpexlem.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
colperpexlem.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. P ) $.
colperpexlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
colperpexlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( K ` ( M ` C ) ) = ( N ` C ) ) $.
colperpexlem1 $p |- ( ph -> <" B A Q "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
